channel.title: Mouse was controlled by Screen stealer, through SCAR software!
channel.description:
Hey
The 1st time I downloaded SCAR, I downloaded a program called 'Fl4x0r' Which automatically picks flax while I'm AFK.
As I downloaded SCAR and added the script to it (I downloaded the script via a ZIP file) The mouse began to move on its own, It seemed as though it was hovering towards 'My computer' I quickly struggled with this screen Hi-jacker over the mouse, and managed to disable the SCAR software; Thus ending the screen hi-jackers fun.
I wanted to know, Is this the program SCAR's general way of greetings new users, by Hi-jacking them? Or was it merely the script which I downloaded?
Could it possibly have been the script working?
Please reply as I am curious to know before I attempt to Re-download SCAR and give it another chance :P
I think it's also worth mentioning I am sort of a Newbie in the field or Runescape Scripting, So go slow :D

item.title: Mouse was controlled by Screen stealer, through SCAR software!
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

KyleGut3:

he meant what the script was written for. You wouldnt use one of my miscellanious MMORPG scripts on neopets, it would just trip out or do nothing.

Excactly.

Read full topic

item.source: Mouse was controlled by Screen stealer, through SCAR software!

item.title: Mouse was controlled by Screen stealer, through SCAR software!
item.dc:creator: @Akuma Akuma
item.description:
@Akuma wrote:

[quote=“Mopar Monk, post:4, topic:20422”]Oh, Ok
Thanks for the info

I think it might have been a malicious program; because it felt like someone was controlling it.
Example: I moved the mouse towards the ‘All programs’ tab, and it struggled to reach ‘my computer’

Thanks for the help

~M0nk ~

P.S: In which forum might I find tutorials on how to use scripts?
I’m trying to find a script that will auto-cast the spell ‘curse’ so I can train mage[/quote]

Scar was controlling it

Read full topic

It could have just been the script. If you didn’t select the Rs window and just press play it may have found a color near my computer that was in the Flaxing script somewhere, therefore trying to click on it thinking it was in Runescape.
